alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Montgomery; Randolph; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Slow-moving thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Davidson, northwestern Montgomery, Randolph and northeastern Stanly Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking slow-moving thunderstorms along a line extending from near Randleman to near Badin Lake to near Albemarle. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and locally heavy rainfall amounts of one to two inches in the next hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Asheboro, Albemarle, Randleman, North Carolina Zoo, Badin Lake, Badin, Ramseur, Denton, Franklinville and Richfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
